com.interpss.common.msg.impl

Class IPSSMsgHubBaseImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • com.interpss.common.msg.impl.IPSSMsgHubBaseImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPSSMsgHubBase, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IPSSMsgHubImpl

    public class IPSSMsgHubBaseImpl
extends java.util.EventObject
implements IPSSMsgHubBase
    InterPSS Message hub, where msg is dispatched to the message listeners contained.
    See Also:
